
<p align="center">
  <a href="https://gallery.stairlab.io/">

</p>

<h3 align="center">xcsi</h3>


<p align="center">
Build finite element models for OpenSees and Xara from CSiBridge and SAP2000 input files.
  <br>
  <a href="https://gallery.stairlab.io/"><strong>Explore the STAIRLab gallery Â»</strong></a>
</p>

See [`tests/painter.py`](tests/painter.py) for an example of the Python API.
